channel.title: Ideas for A/B testing in 2016
channel.description:
Here's a useful set of ideas of what you could change to optimise your landing page, sign-up page, and purchase page:
http://www.nickkolenda.com/conversion-optimization-psychology/
You'll need to give an email to get to the content. (Or you could just add "the-members-area" to the root URL.)
There are many ideas, all of which the author claims are backed up with research into psychology and/or examples of where they've worked. I've tried many of them myself in recent months, and found that contrary to the claims, they didn't budge my conversions at all. But YMMV.

item.title: Ideas for A/B testing in 2016
item.dc:creator: SteveMcLeod
item.description:
Here’s a useful set of ideas of what you could change to optimise your landing page, sign-up page, and purchase page:

Nick Kolenda

Conversion Optimization: An Enormous List of Psychological Tactics

Welcome to a huge resource on conversion rate optimization. You'll learn 30 psychological tactics to influence your website visitors.

You’ll need to give an email to get to the content. (Or you could just add “the-members-area” to the root URL.)

There are many ideas, all of which the author claims are backed up with research into psychology and/or examples of where they’ve worked. I’ve tried many of them myself in recent months, and found that contrary to the claims, they didn’t budge my conversions at all. But YMMV.

Read full topic
